website_summaries.verdict: These highly detailed animals are sure to impress young nature fans, and since this set is so inexpensive, building a shark, squid, and angler isn’t out of the question.
pros: Create your choice of a squid, shark, or angler fish
Special whale instructions available on LEGO website
cons: You can only build one sea creature at a time

customer_reviews.title: 4 in 1
customer_reviews.text: Great set for the price, fun to build and play with. This is the first 4 in 1 set that I've seen, as you can go online and download instructions to build a whale, as well.
customer_reviews.author: David Durn

customer_reviews.title: Fun (if you don't have previous deep sea sets)
customer_reviews.text: As always with the Creator 3-in-1, an impressive set of sea creatures. Despite the main build being the shark, many of the other designs haven't been done multiple times in LEGO and are wonderfully crafted. (there's even a 4th build instructions on the LEGO website) Though it is an unusual choice to include the second tiny creature and treasure to be built from this Creations set at the same time as the main build, there's still a great variety of parts that could be useful for other imaginative designs!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: 4 in 1!
customer_reviews.text: This is technically a 4 in 1. Such a fun set to go with my sea theme. Very durable if you have kids (or a girlfriend in my case lol) that likes to play with them afterwards. I was able to make a lobster with the remaining red pieces.
customer_reviews.author: PitaPumpkinEater

customer_reviews.title: 3in1 set, Many options, Bendable fish body, great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Love love this set! My six year old was able to build it himself with minimal help. He was anxious to play it so skipped a step or two. 😉 Love that you can build it into 3 different sets: shark/crab, Squid , Anglerfish/Angelfish. There is a forth one you can get instructions online for a whale/small squid. Biggest plus is the ability to bend the body of larger fish for play.
customer_reviews.author: See Lee

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: The build was really fun! Both the shark and crab both look great and have a ton of posability. These look great on display in my room. I think it’s pretty good as a parts pack too since you get some ball-joint pieces and a handful of dark blue pieces. It’s great for building your own creatures.
customer_reviews.author: Hey

customer_reviews.title: Most under-priced Lego set I've seen
customer_reviews.text: Just on a price-per-part basis, this set is grossly under-priced. It's a new set, why is it already getting 25% discounts? 12 bucks for 230 pieces?! Sure, no included figures, but it has four great builds. There are some really interesting building techniques too, like how the eyes are built in the shark's head. And it's even a good parts pack, with lots of useful dark blue pieces and ball joints. The builds are bigger than they appear on the box. The shark is satisfyingly chunky. Best $20 and under set for 2019, tied with Benny's Space Squad.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Schumm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Set
customer_reviews.text: I am an avid Lego girl. I have many many sets. I like this one, and bought one for my friend’s son as well. I love that you can build multiple items. My only complaint is that my set came with several pieces missing (her son’s didn’t have any missing thankfully). I’ve never had a set with missing pieces. That said, Lego is awesome and has a section on their site where you can order the missing parts for free. I ordered mine and they came within a week. Set fixed, problem solved. I took a star off for inconvenience.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Michele

customer_reviews.title: Fun set, great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set at a great price. You can make three different models in this one set. It’s perfect for my ocean loving child. I especially love the teeth on the shark.
customer_reviews.author: Kriston

customer_reviews.title: How can you not like lego?
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes getting yourself a nice little Lego set is important. It helps some of your creativity and I think I will start doing small builds like this more often. PUts your brain to work and you can do a lot of fun stuff with legos obviously. They shark is super fun and awesome if you do a cool jaws scene with your other city legos. The crab is just whatever. It looks to comical but the shark looks dope with it's moving fin parts etc.
customer_reviews.author: Control Room 2020

customer_reviews.title: Cute set
customer_reviews.text: This is such a cute set, the shark is so awesome! All the pieces are great, my son has really enjoyed playing with the shark and crab. Love that we can make 4 different options with this one set. However I do wish it came with a LEGO separator.
customer_reviews.author: Queen sweetie

customer_reviews.title: A bit of sneaky advertising! Not a true 3 in 1 kit but rather a 1 at a time kit!
customer_reviews.text: When my 5 year old saw the pictures on the box she imagined that she would have all three animals at the same time in her imaginary aquarium. Once we finished the shark we realized that there was no pieces left over to do the Squid and Killer Fish! If you do the Squid you can't do the crab and treasure chest. There is also a picture of a giant Whale somewhere on the back cover of one of the instruction leaflet but no instructions inside the leaflets on how to procure a Whale from the Legos. Had we known how these Creator sets worked I would've bought a set with more pieces and more creatures at one time.
customer_reviews.author: Olaf Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: My son Loved this he loves sharks so he was super happy to receive this LEGO set and it was easy for him to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Sara B

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful, And A Great Excuse To Spend Quality Time with your Child or Grandchild, etc.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set, but buy three, if the child you are purchasing for likes all three animals. Because once you've put together the Shark [our first], neither of you will be willing to take it apart to do a different one. I bought three, and my little godson [5] loves his Shark [with crab], his Giant Squid, and his Angler Fish [with little fish]. And I was able to cobble together a second crab, albeit with one claw missing half. When I had a saltwater aquarium, I had one hermit crab with the same problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bunclody Senator

customer_reviews.title: Could Not Have Been Better Received!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for an eight-year-old boy with special needs. The boy was able to put it together with only a little help from a sibling without needing a parent to help. The Mom said it gave the boy a sense of confidence that he was able to accomplish that and has also loved playing with it. Unlike other Lego items, like cars and such, where the little pieces are constantly falling off, apparently this one has stayed together really, really well. This was an excellent purchase! Parents were pleased so the buyer is pleased! Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: GoodMorningLife234

customer_reviews.title: Missing one piece
customer_reviews.text: I only gave it a 3 star because one piece is missing or should I say one piece is not correctly shaped. You see on the picture that I should have a hook to fit the ball of the lady piece of the shark but instead it’s something closed. I’m going to have to go to the LEGO store hoping they have the missing piece to complete the shark. Other than that it’s a great construction set...
customer_reviews.author: F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect. Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: We saw this model at a local museum and my son wanted to purchase it there. I checked the price on Amazon from the gift shop and noticed that the item was half the advertised price. I ordered on a Sunday with Prime and it arrived by Tuesday. My son is 5 years old so it was challenging, but we worked through it together. We were able to successfully create all three objects in an hour. It was a ideal substitute for watching TV.
customer_reviews.author: Remy

customer_reviews.title: Lego 3-in-1 creator sets
customer_reviews.text: The Lego 3-in-1 creator sets, especially this set, are some of the best Lego deals out there. There are lots of unique pieces in this set, tons of replayability because it's actually a 4-in-1 (4th set of instructions available online to build a whale). I got this for my 3 1/2 year old son and he loves it. I have to help him with the builds a bit, but he has out grown Duplos and absolutely loves these "big kid" sets.
customer_reviews.author: The Mad Hatter

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my 6 yr old grandson and he loved it. He loves legos, has the patience to follow the directions in the book by himself, which is great-- kept him busy for a few hours! Somewhat challenging for a 6 yr old, but he stuck with it and ended up with an awesome shark and mini crab. Best thing about this set is he can re-assemble it into two other creatures when he gets bored with the shark. Well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Michel1030

customer_reviews.title: LEGO Creator 3in1 Deep Sea Creatures 31088 Building Kit , New 2019 (230 Piece)
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son knowing he would love the shark, and he did, but inevitably wanted the angler fish build. Wouldn't you figure... He still wants the shark now though, so I am going to have to buy another one to get him the shark. He did want the quid option too but not as much as the other two. Probably just get two more anyway so he can have all three without having to take apart and rebuild. Price was maybe $12 (not exactly sure at the moment) and shipping was only 2 days. Will be an easy decision to order 2 more.
customer_reviews.author: David L.

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a very fun and educational set!
customer_reviews.text: Great set for children interested in ocean animals! Our little one just attended a virtual ocean camp and learned all about all the animals featured in this 3-in-1 set. We even built the fourth build, the whale, with instructions from the LEGO website! Lots of fun! Buy extra sets if you want to display several of the featured builds. Overall, a very fun and educational set!
customer_reviews.author: Santander

customer_reviews.title: Good value under da sea
customer_reviews.text: The shark is pretty cool, especially the teeth and mouth, but the cute crab is the star of this seafood circus. Considering the 3-in-1 versatility and relatively low price for a Lego set, this might not be a must-buy classic, but it's definitely worthwhile. I keep 'em on a shelf, and the little crab holds a goblet aloft in my direction whenever I pass by. Cheers, little fella!
customer_reviews.author: theqissilent

customer_reviews.title: Deceiving
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why I thought this would be all 3 pictured. You can only build 1 at a time. My kid builds them once and then crashes them, looses the pieces. He didn't choose wisely and built the squid first. Didn't get to make the other two - missing pieces now.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Knapp

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Shark Lovers ❤️
customer_reviews.text: My grandsons age 6 and 8 really enjoy the Creator 3-in-1 sets. I especially like them because there’s 3 different creatures to build and we normally do them during our morning visit. During the evening they will take the set and build 3 more creatures that they dream up in their heads. These 3-in-sets make a great gift and are appropriate for girls as well as boys. Perfect!! 😀
customer_reviews.author: Kattarina

customer_reviews.title: Neat-o factor makes it more fun than most
customer_reviews.text: My kid gets lego sets every Xmas and THIS one he gets a bigger kick out of than he has some of the really big and expensive ones. The animals provide a real neat-o factor and he makes all sorts of stuff with it. Every lego nut needs this set to supplement their craft because it has some really neat parts and versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Frequent Web Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great toy
customer_reviews.text: My son is a huge LEGO fan, and recently shark fan. So this is 2 in 1 that he likes the most right now. I bought it without letting him know , he was so so happy and excited when he opened the box!!! His face was beaming. He assembled it super fast))) and now plays with it every day. Highly recommend for LEGO lovers.
customer_reviews.author: Lenany

customer_reviews.title: So-so
customer_reviews.text: Cursed should be the bean counter who decided to merge the shark and the crab to make a squid. My 4 year old who loves squids and crabs cried his eyes out because he couldn't understand that he can't have both at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Erinnisse Heuer

customer_reviews.title: For my shark loving grandson
customer_reviews.text: Had I known this was out there, I would have gotten it long ago! My grandson (8) said it was his favorite present for Xmas. He loves it, and won’t let anyone else play with the set. I’m going out on a limb, and saying it’s a great set. Rather if the recipient loves sharks, it’s “the greatest ever ever!!”
customer_reviews.author: Andra Myers

customer_reviews.title: An awesome 3 in 1 set!
customer_reviews.text: My kids love ocean animals so this set was perfect for them. The even more awesome part is that it's actually a 4 in 1! The option to create a sperm whale really made it for my son. He's 5 and practically memorized all the steps after the first day. Can't wait to try other sets.
customer_reviews.author: JCheng

customer_reviews.title: Great 3 in 1
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic 3 in 1 kit. We found a modification online and mechanized the shark...even better! One of my fave 3 in 1 builds.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorMom777

customer_reviews.title: Great fun but missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: This was super fun and easy to assemble. My only issue is that multiple pieces were missing from our box. We were so excited to finish the shark, but many pieces for his tale were missing :(
customer_reviews.author: Lysa

customer_reviews.title: Best Lego set for the money period.
customer_reviews.text: Lego’s are amazing, so amazing we overlook the killer price tags. But this set somehow comes in at a regular toy price point while being one of the best and most versatile sets lego has ever made. There are three different build options so you can take it apart and build it for variety if thats your thing. And every build has a main animal and a companion animal. And there is a 4th build for a whale available online which is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: fun both to build and to play with
customer_reviews.text: All the "Creator" series legos are good just because you can use the same pieces for three different designs, ensuring that the creations get taken apart and reassembled at least twice. In this set, my son was particularly enthusiastic about all the things the animals could "do," all the moving parts once the creatures were built.
customer_reviews.author: L. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Grandson loved it,
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves animals & creatures so this was right down his ally. LOTS of tiny pieces but they(dad had to help as he’s not quite 6 yet but loves LEGO stuff) got it all together & he thought it was cool! Grandma scored on this LEGO set!!
customer_reviews.author: Gina H.

customer_reviews.title: It’s LEGO. What’s not to love
customer_reviews.text: Put this together with my 3 year old (I know what you’re thinking, how could someone so uncoordinated build legos?). But luckily for me my 3 year old is coordinated and loves legos. Fun little set. With these weren’t so expensive, but it is what it is. Fun set. Would buy (similar) set again
customer_reviews.author: Dantes

customer_reviews.title: Needs better instructions
customer_reviews.text: It's lego. $$$$ directions could be better never could get sharks head to attach to body.
customer_reviews.author: James Buckley

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my eight year old who loves sharks. The instructions were easy enough to follow but still a little challenging. Can be made into 3 different projects, but you have to take one apart to create a different one.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia K.

customer_reviews.title: Difficult for 6yo to assemble alone, but great opportunity for team effort with a grandparent!
customer_reviews.text: This is a standard gift for 6 year old LEGO-maniacs. They love the options and with a little help, can assemble. The downside is that they have to take apart one sea creature to make another. So you may have to buy another set!
customer_reviews.author: PW

customer_reviews.title: Great toy for kids. Great value. Win for dad!
customer_reviews.text: Great product for kids! My 7 year built himself and had a blast. He said it was "epic". The best part is that they can make 3 different creatures. The next morning after building the shark he was breaking it down to make the fish. Great toy.
customer_reviews.author: Joe Possum

customer_reviews.title: Cool LEGO creatures
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a gift. My 9 yr old shark lover was very pleased & easily able to put together, with still some fun challenge. It sounds silly, but we were all impressed by the cool way LEGO made the shark teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin VanWinkle

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun
customer_reviews.text: This Lego set is not only fun to build, but also great to play with afterwards. Each sea creature has movable parts. There is also the option of building a fourth creature from instructions online!
customer_reviews.author: lildebbiec

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my 6 year old, spent HOURS quietly making!
customer_reviews.text: We have done some Lego kits before but this 3in1 was the BEST BY FAR. Perfect amount of detail to keep my 6 year old focused and busy for hours but he was able to finish the shark the first night. Then took apart the next day to make the next design, and so on. Now hes back to the shark! Definitely worth keeping the pieces in their own container away from his other legos so he can make it over and over again. I cant wait for him to get more of these 3in1 sets, they are perfect!
customer_reviews.author: tess

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 year old loves to assemble legos at this age. The 3-1 Creator sets are great because he can make 3 separate toys with the same pieces. On this set he literally spent half the day putting together all 3 options. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: AABT

customer_reviews.title: Not just a shark!
customer_reviews.text: A great creator set for little bio-science minds. The shark option is fantastic but the squid option is even better. Ages under 7 will likely need help building. Creatures are sturdy and do not fall apart easily.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Hours of fun for me and my nephew! Can make 3 different creatures with the directions and pieces included and can look up online more directions for other things to build with these pieces.
customer_reviews.author: doctur44

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Hospital Donation
customer_reviews.text: Bought this among other toys as a donation for LA Children’s Hospital is memory of our nephew. My sister-in-law commented on how cute all the items were and how proud she was to donate them.
customer_reviews.author: Megan P.

customer_reviews.title: Be aware
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t aware that you had to take one apart to build another. I ended up having to buy a second kit because my grandson wanted to build 2 of the creatures and keep them together
customer_reviews.author: Leroy J.

customer_reviews.title: Jawsome set!
customer_reviews.text: I really got my moneys worth with this set. Very different from the other 3in one sets. My grandson loved it! The shark is fairly large and very colorful. Many pieces, but not difficult to put together. GREAT set!
customer_reviews.author: butterfly queen

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: After almost finishing the shark we were missing 3 pieces! We could not complete the tail! I ended up going through some of his other legos just to fin only one of the missing pieces. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: 4 year old loves this and loves the variety of creatures he can create. He just recently got into legos so the only issue he finds is he cannot get the pieces apart easily.
customer_reviews.author: Brie

customer_reviews.title: So adorable
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 10 yr old. He put it together quickly and loved the shark. I had to buy him another set so he could make the squid to fight against the whale or shark.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The shark is really good
customer_reviews.text: The ingenuity of this build is great. The crab is cute, but that shark is really nice! An expert LEGO designer invented this work of art. Your kid will be impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: It's Lego and it's fun
customer_reviews.text: This is a real fun Lego set. Got two of them for two kids and they thoroughly enjoyed the options they could make (did have to help my five year old a bit, but I still love Lego as well :))
customer_reviews.author: BJSB

customer_reviews.title: So cool, love the teeth
customer_reviews.text: So cool, love the shark teeth. Although they can fall of a little easier than I would like. The others havn't been done,but the shark is a great size. We also bought one as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great kit
customer_reviews.text: Gift for 3 grandsons to give them something to do in the evenings on a family beach vacation. All gifts had an ocean theme. :) This and the other ocean themed Lego kits were a big hit with the 3 through 8 year olds.
customer_reviews.author: rmkjbg6

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Great little set! Comes just like shown. My kiddos loved the shark and crab! Both my 6yo and 9yo put together. They like that more than one creature was able to be made.
customer_reviews.author: K Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Cute set with bonus 4th build available online.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this set for my 8-year-old grandson... he really loves the Creator Lego sets. This one is very cute. I like that it has 3 different builds, plus a 4th is available online. Keeps him occupied for a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Pagano

customer_reviews.title: Fun to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great to make with your grandson. Live the instructions that are picture perfect for someone like me. Best to divide the blocks into groups for ease
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Wallace

customer_reviews.title: Great Lego set!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Lego set for my grandson’s 7th birthday. He loves Legos and this is one that he didn’t have. He put it together easily and has added these sea creatures to his Lego collection.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Plunkett

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 10 year old who loves legos like nobody else. He is always looking for the next best thing. While this was fairly simple to assemble, he had fun doing so!
customer_reviews.author: Jibs

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loves it
customer_reviews.text: My son is a super Lego fan and he especially loves the 3 in 1 sets. This one in particular is especially good. All 3 of the creatures are fun and creative. This was the first one we got for him and it's still his favorite.
customer_reviews.author: J. Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Lots Of Fun, Really Fun Kit
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this kit it great! All three of the included plans create neat creatures, and there’s a fourth online that lets you make a whale and squid that’s just awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Worth it and you saved money
customer_reviews.text: Like i said in my other like the dinosaur one . My nephew is LEGO fan the look on his face he loves it for sure ! “It’s a 3 in 1 series !!! You can make 3 things ! “ -6 year old nephew In an effort to save money most of the time I regret buying it . This one worth it !
customer_reviews.author: iReview

customer_reviews.title: A nice set for a 10-yr-old (or adults)
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our son as a gift. How do you rate a Lego set? They’re all so cool! My only beef is that the shark has attacked several of the LEGO men who have now been left amputees.
customer_reviews.author: Gene

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old (quite the proficient lego builder for his age) loves this set. He has built and rebuilt all the options a bunch of times. A really fun set! Challenging, but not way too hard.
customer_reviews.author: mhansen

customer_reviews.title: A Really Solid Product Overall
customer_reviews.text: Came missing a piece. That’s my only gripe. But I can’t even be mad because LEGO were so cool about it and shipped my missing piece for free. This is a really cool set that gives you a load of options for less than $20. I wouldn’t expect anything less from a LEGO Creator set. A really solid product for anybody looking to build something cool.
customer_reviews.author: beyondhayashi

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my Shark loving 8 year old! He was able to put it all together himself and it's joints make it fun to build and play with!
customer_reviews.author: Kaila

customer_reviews.title: Fun lego set
customer_reviews.text: My son has enjoyed this lego set. He enjoyed building and and playing with it. Super cute toy and the parts stay together well after it is built.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Shark 3-in-1 LEGO set
customer_reviews.text: LEGO sets are awesome especially 3-in-1 sets like this one! even better an sharks!this was a good gift to give him the night before his birthday very happy with price & quantity
customer_reviews.author: Britney

customer_reviews.title: A hit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my son, every cousin and friend of Lego age. Raving reviews from all of them! Everyone loved the flexibility to make so many different creatures!
customer_reviews.author: Nakiah Burnes

customer_reviews.title: Great set and very reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: Can build different things from this set. My 7yo future marine biologist loved it and still playing with it often. Would make a great gift for 6-8 yo kid.
customer_reviews.author: FLGirl

customer_reviews.title: All 6 of my grandsons have it.
customer_reviews.text: All 6 grandsons did them....and took them apart and did the next one....and the next one. It was an all day Lego marathon. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: djriggin

customer_reviews.title: Love it, but....
customer_reviews.text: We love it, unfortunally was missing just one piece and we couldn't find the replacement, even looked in to Lego website and IT's not avialible.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Vargas

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: We love legos in my house. My 6 year old was able to put this together with my help. He really liked all the different options of builds. Good product for kid who loves ocean animals.
customer_reviews.author: jessica m avalos

customer_reviews.title: They look like fun.
customer_reviews.text: But a couple of these for Toys for Tots. They looked really fun - I'm sure the kids who receive them will really like them.
customer_reviews.author: NT Deb

customer_reviews.title: Keeps them occupied
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my nephew for his 7th birthday. He had the squid put together in about an hour. It's usually difficult to capture his attention for long without something electronic so this was a big deal. Definitely a good buy :-)
customer_reviews.author: Jen W.

customer_reviews.title: "Spring" LEGO display for the kitchen table.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome LEGO set. The wife puts legos on display based on the season.
customer_reviews.author: J. Craw

customer_reviews.title: Great detail, some realistic movement.
customer_reviews.text: Just awesome. The shark moves in a few hinged spots and the crab is super cute! My son got it for his 7th birthday and was able to put it together by himself.
customer_reviews.author: Fanna Nicole Smith

customer_reviews.title: One if my favorite LEGO sets!
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old absolutely loves this set. The 3-in-1 design make this set so fun and versatile. The shark will not disappoint!
customer_reviews.author: sjaramillo27

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Kept my daughter entertained for hours today. Missing a piece, but it was easy to repkace from our stock!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas T. Von Hoene

customer_reviews.title: Can't go wrong with LEGO.
customer_reviews.text: Really fun to build with my nephew, he understood most of the manual, but it was a bit confusing at times with the orientation of the parts. Wish it came with a parts count list, I had to search for one online and it wasn't an official list.
customer_reviews.author: Efrain

customer_reviews.title: Unique and fun
customer_reviews.text: I did try the other sets for it and they all snapped together perfectly in a very tight grip, I’m very happy for the final results.
customer_reviews.author: Julianna

customer_reviews.title: Great product for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: My son, who is 11 (2019 year) absolutely loved this product. He loves sharks and building things and this was a perfect gift for him!
customer_reviews.author: Karen P.

customer_reviews.title: cute set.
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old grandson loved this set. Shark and crab are very cute. We haven't made the squid yet but I would recommend this set.
customer_reviews.author: Squiggy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I bought it for my sons 4th birthday and I put it together. He loves it! It was super easy to put together.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Grobe

customer_reviews.title: Most fun lego set yet!
customer_reviews.text: We have loved the versatility of this lego set! It has made for lots of fun play and learning how to construct and put legos together! We have plans for more of these 3-in-1 sets in the future!

product_meta.title: LEGO Creator 3in1 Deep Sea Creatures 31088 Make a Shark, Squid, Angler Fish, and Crab with this Sea Animal Toy Building Kit (230 Pieces)
product_meta.description: Kids can enjoy underwater ocean adventures with the LEGO Creator 3in1 31088 Deep Sea Creatures building kit, featuring a scary toy shark with a realistic dark-blue and white color scheme, opening mouth full of pointy teeth, moving fins, movable body joints and reflective eyes--perfect for hours of pretend play! Plus, this ocean set comes with a posable toy crab with a box of treasure. With LEGO Creator 3in1 sets you get 3 different build and play experiences. Kids can rebuild this set into more multiple ocean animal toys, including a posable toy squid or a wide-mouthed Angler Fish. This set also invites kids to create their own animal toys with their imaginations!
feature_bullets: Kids can create their own animal with this build and rebuild ocean playset featuring 3 toy sea creatures, They can go from building a scary toy shark and a crab with a box of treasure to building a flexible toy squid or a giant-mouthed Angler Fish

In addition to building multiple toy animal figures, this deep sea creatures playset includes a scary model shark with an opening mouth, pointy teeth, posable fins, movable joints and reflective eyes-- the perfect action toy for imaginative play

With LEGO Creator 3in1 sets kids get 3 different build and play experiences for hours of pretend play with these toy sea creatures, This 230 piece animal set is ideal for boys and girls aged 7+ and make a great holiday or birthday gift

This LEGO Creator 3in1 Deep Sea Creatures building set in which kids can build 3 ocean animals can be built with all other original LEGO sets and LEGO bricks for endless pretend play, This build and play set includes the perfect animal toys for kids

Toy shark is over 3 inches (8cm) high, 8 inches (21cm) long and 3 inches (9cm) wide; Toy crab is over 1 inches (3cm) long and 4 inches (11cm) wide; Toy squid is over 1 inches (4cm) high, 7 inches (18cm) long and 8 inches (22cm) wide; Angler Fish is over 1 inches (5cm) high, 5 inches (14cm) long and 3 inches (8cm) wide

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars5,114 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
